column4: anyone know where i can download sun-java6-plugin?  My friend shows other java6 stuff, but the plugin doesn't show up for some reason
I need java for my browser
Then there is no solution currently.
To add on what jrib said, you will not gain any performance increase unless you're running major graphic processing most likely.
We're talking video processing here like batch movie editing :)
Well, there's nothing wrong with running it in a 32 bit chroot or with 32 bit firefox I believe
But if yo absolutely won't suffer firefox 32bit I don't see a great solution unfortunately. =/
even if it's not recognizable, it matters imo
There a free java RE's out there, but none have quite the features of the Sun JRE I believe.
It's a question of who owns the code really. Since the official Sun JRE is not public domain we really couldn't do anything even if we had the code.
the java6-jre is available for 64bit, just not the browser plugin
